statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data
SELECT employee_name, productivity_score, report_date FROM employee_performance_data
SELECT employee_name, team_id FROM employee_performance_data ORDER BY employee_name DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data WHERE productivity_score > 80
SELECT employee_name AS name, productivity_score AS score, report_date AS date FROM employee_performance_data
SELECT employee_name, productivity_score FROM employee_performance_data WHERE productivity_score > 80 ORDER BY productivity_score DESC, employee_name ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' AND report_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC, employee_name ASC
SELECT employee_name, team_id FROM employee_performance_data WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY team_id ASC, employee_name DESC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, report_date FROM employee_performance_data WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 1001 AND 2000 ORDER BY employee_id ASC, report_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT team_id FROM employee_performance_data ORDER BY team_id ASC
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_name, start_date FROM employees WHERE performance_score > 4.5
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM employees
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 100
SELECT employee_name, start_date FROM employees WHERE performance_score >= 90 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, start_date, performance_score FROM employees WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY performance_score DESC, start_date ASC
SELECT employee_name, performance_score FROM employees WHERE start_date < '2020-01-01' OR performance_score < 70 ORDER BY performance_score ASC
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY employee_id ASC
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, job_title FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, job_title, hire_date FROM employees WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, productivity_score, performance_date FROM performance_data ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, productivity_trend FROM team_productivity WHERE trend_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, productivity_score, performance_date FROM employees JOIN performance_data ON employees.employee_id = performance_data.employee_id WHERE productivity_score > 80;
SELECT employee_name, job_title, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department='Sales';
SELECT id, name, join_date FROM employees WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM trends WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT team_name, leader_id FROM teams ORDER BY leader_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT e.name, t.team_name, p.productivity_score FROM employees e JOIN teams t ON e.id = t.leader_id JOIN performance p ON e.id = p.employee_id WHERE p.productivity_score > 80;
SELECT t.team_name, COUNT(*) as team_size FROM teams t JOIN employees e ON t.leader_id = e.id GROUP BY t.team_name;
SELECT t.team_name, jsonb_array_elements(trend_data -> 'sales') as sales_trend FROM teams t JOIN trends tr ON t.id = tr.team_id WHERE observation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employees WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT DISTINCT hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM teams WHERE team_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT employee_id, rating_date, rating_value FROM performance_ratings WHERE rating_value > 3 ORDER BY rating_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS team_size FROM teams JOIN team_members ON teams.team_id = team_members.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT employees.name, performance_ratings.rating_value FROM employees JOIN performance_ratings ON employees.employee_id = performance_ratings.employee_id WHERE performance_ratings.rating_value >= 4;

SELECT team_name, AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_productivity FROM teams JOIN performance_trends ON teams.team_id = performance_trends.team_id WHERE trend_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY avg_productivity DESC;
